exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros HsoupCoh Hex. destruct Hex as [y HcohMsg]. unfold soupCoh. simpl. split. - apply: post_valid. apply: HsoupCoh. - move=> m0 ms Hfind. case: (find m0 (dsoup d)) Hfind => [ms' | ] //=. move=> Heq. move: (HsoupCoh m0 ms' Heq) => Hex'. destruct Hex' as [y' HcohMsg']. exists y'. move: HcohMsg' => [] H'. + rewrite H' in HcohMsg. apply HcohMsg. + move: H' => ->. apply HcohMsg.
